duties_responsibilities.duty: Overhaul, maintain, and repair airframe components, powerplants, aircraft communication equipment, and associated components in accordance with Company manuals and manufacturer's manuals.
Constantly inspect for defective, worn, or failed parts, as well as ensure safe working conditions for aircraft components.
Perform housekeeping duties, including policing work area and maintaining company property.
Complete tasks assigned by Supervisor or higher management, and be directly responsible to the Director of Quality Control when exercising authority under the RII provisions.
Attend all Company training classes as assigned by the Director of Maintenance.
Travel to other ATI stations to assist with maintenance at the direction of the department manager.

education_certification.credential: Parts 121, 125, 145; Heavy transport category aircraft experience preferred
Valid passport or the ability to get one
